title: Coconut Estate for sale in Wariyapola
details:
30 Acre Coconut Estate within 1 km of kurunegala /puttalam main road with good road access to the estate

Easily accessible through cmb /Katunayake /minuwangoda /Giriulle /Narammala /Wariyapola road within 2 hours of easy drive of traveling from cmb

With 1600 well grown coconut trees and over 500 young trees give a yield of about 18000 - coconuts per harvest during the peak season

Property is also enriched with Cashew, Mango, Orange, plantains and many others that bring additional income apart from Coconuts

Water is available throughout the year through agriculture wells and tube wells

3 phase Electricity, CCTV cameras and a neatly erected fence

Other availabilities
• large tractor
• 1 land master tractors
• Workers quarters

* Single story bungalow with 3 bed rooms and attached bathrooms
Large dining and a large hall and verandas and a 60 feet long swimming pool

Definitely a money's worth

Inspection by prior appointment only

No Brokers

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD , (next to mahanama college )
COLOMBO 03
